comment._content: Great series of photos. Very full description of the ship and complementary photos here - www.ssmaritime.com/Awatea.htm

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/33546386@N03] They are very beautiful photographs aren't they?
